articles.caption: A look at Korean exchanges to delist Wemade's native token
articles.title: The Block: Korean exchanges to delist gaming company Wemade's native token
articles.description: Top South Korean exchanges will take gaming company Wemade's wemix token off their books on Dec. 8, a little over a month since they issued an investment warning against the token.

articles.caption: A look at Microsoft trying to convince regulators that CoD isn't all that
articles.title: Microsoft says Call of Duty isn't that important, actually
articles.description: In a bid to convince regulators to approve its Activision Blizzard deal, Microsoft has claimed that Call of Duty isn't all that.
